title: Need to ID a Coffee Shop font
author: moylc

comments.content: "BIRCH" looks like very lose to a **[Banque Gothique Bold Extra Cond](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/banque-gothique-rr/)** with a modified |C|

Clearly "Bank Gothic-ish". Some more possibilities without modification: [Bourgeois](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/virusfonts/bourgeois) VF, [Cartella](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/cartella-nf) NF, [Stratum 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/stratum2), [Face Off](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012504/http:/www.dafont.com/face-off-m54.font), [Industry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012504/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/industry), [Refrigerator Deluxe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/refrigerator-deluxe) MS, [Canby](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420012504/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/canby) JNL
